attributes.action: assited  the right to have a youth club with help form local council in manor farm bristol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Just do a search for a local youth club, and you will see why there are so many children, and teenagers wandering the streets at all hours of the day and night.

There is a complete lack of facilities locally for anyone under adult age, and a quick check of the area will show you why so many of these youngsters end up in trouble of some kind locally.

We the undersigned support the provision of an all-purpose youth centre for Manor Farm, and surrounding areas not currently covered to provide wide-ranging facilities for young people.

Lets make this work by showing our children in the area how to make the system work for them
